name: hospital-management-system
description: Hospital Management System - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "DB,BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run dev:db" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.clean: cd database && docker compose down -v && cd ../backend && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../frontend && rm -rf dist node_modules
